thread.title: Ubuntu Touch OTA-7 Gets New Unity 8, More Convergence Features
thread.title_full: Ubuntu Touch OTA-7 Gets New Unity 8, More Convergence Features

title: Ubuntu Touch OTA-7 Gets New Unity 8, More Convergence Features
text: Ubuntu Touch OTA-7 Gets New Unity 8, More Convergence Features Thursday, 17 September 2015 (18 minutes ago) Today, September 17, Canonical's Łukasz Zemczak sent in his daily report on the work done by the Ubuntu Touch developers for the upcoming major software update of the mobile operating system, OTA-7. According to Mr. Zemczak, the day of September 17 was a busy day for Ubuntu Touch developers as they managed to implement several new features, as well as to fix more of those annoying bugs that have been reported by users since the Ubuntu Touch OTA-6 update.
